issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Nightly ubuntu 14.04 fails because of dataset filter tests
issue.body:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7184?focusedCommentId=17026912) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
We're not running 14.04 nightly builds anymore, so closing.
